creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: I don’t think democracy is dead yet. But they sure do! That’s how they do it: slowly, methodically, with a smile on their faces. The Regime is suffocating it a little bit more each day. I simply can not think of any other justification for the multiple ways in which the operation of USPS is being destroyed. It is being done solely to further corrupt the election process.
title: August 15, 2020: DEATH OF DEMOCRACY CELEBRATION PICNIC! (Save USPS!)
